content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, I'm glad you could make it to see the apartment in Mannheim. The apartment is quite cozy and has a lot of natural light. I'm sure it will meet your needs. As for the rental price, I was thinking we could start at 700 Euros per month. This should be a fair price, considering the location and size of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month. Thank you for the offer.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Great, I'm glad you agree to the price of 700 Euros per month. This is a very fair and competitive rental price for an apartment in Mannheim, and I'm sure it will attract other potential tenants as well. I'm happy to have you as a tenant and look forward to a successful tenancy agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to ask if there are any additional costs that I need to be aware of, such as utilities or maintenance fees.

Also, is there a minimum lease term that I need to sign up for?

Finally, what is the procedure for ending the tenancy agreement if I need to move out?

Thank you.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Of course, Hassan. I'm glad you have some questions. There are no additional costs for utilities or maintenance fees included in the monthly rental price. However, you will be responsible for paying for any additional services or amenities that you use, such as internet or cable TV.

As for the minimum lease term, I would like to request a minimum of 12 months. This will provide me with a stable source of income and will also give you the opportunity to fully experience living in Mannheim.

If you need to move out, the procedure is quite simple. Just give me at least 30 days' notice in writing, and we can discuss the terms of your departure. I will do my best to accommodate your needs and ensure a smooth transition.
name: Heinrich Heine
